text: Tired Not my first time posting here  but my first time posting on this account Where do I begin  Grew up with a narcissistic dysfunctional family  bullied in school  abused by my first boyfriend   years  just a generally messed up life  I didn t really except any of this until I had a nervous break down last year  developed panic disorder and eating disorder  and put myself into therapy  All along I thought I had been the one who was the problem   Things were really turning around  I was making moves to move to a new city with a friend  planning moves with my career and my art  and really looking forward to healing And then the coronavirus hit the United States  My friend and I weren t ready to settle down in time  we couldn t get supplies to weather a shutdown  I had to go back to my family  Because of social distancing I can t hide out in my usual haunts away from my family  I don t have any friends in this town  Thankfully our house is big enough that I can hide away somewhere most of the day  but whenever They walk in the room it s a jab at  something that I m doing or eating or wearing   I m just really tired   I think I m grieving  too  I felt loved  heard  and wanted for the first time in   years when I was with my friend  I also realized how messed up I was because of my background and I was honestly looking forward to getting better   I don t know how long this quarantine is going to last  I don t know how long I can handle this I m tired
summary: Tired is the first person to post on this account. She grew up with a narcissistic dysfunctional family. She was bullied in school and abused by her first boyfriend. She had a nervous break down last year and developed panic disorder and eating disorder. She wanted to move to a new city with a friend planning moves with her career and her art. Coronavirus hit the U.S. and she couldn't get supplies to weather a shutdown. She went back to her family.
